PMD: Planar Multibody Dynamics Open-Source Simulation Software

PMD is a Python library for dynamic analysis, which allows the construction of mechanical models and their numerical simulation.

Il codice sorgente è disponibile su [GitHub](https://github.com/GiacomoCangi/PMD).

::::{grid} 2 :::{grid-item-card} Title 1 A ::: :::{grid-item-card} Title 2 B ::: :::

### Getting Started

New to PMD? Check out the getting started guides. They contain an introduction to PMD’s main concepts and links to additional tutorials. ::
